channel.title: How to change status numbers into words
channel.description:
I have a Donator status on my server, and i've put a line into quest tab that says
"Member Status: 2" but i want to change this "2" to "Donator" ...

item.title: How to change status numbers into words
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

i know what you mean, but i really dont know how to code it… =s

Read full topic
item.source: How to change status numbers into words

item.title: How to change status numbers into words
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

A way I could imagine you do it (but don’t ask me how) is using an IF statement. For example:

if(memberStatus = 2);
print “donator”;
elseif print “not donator”;

That code will NOT BE RIGHT (I’m not a programmer), but should get you to think about how you could do it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change status numbers into words
